quote: I got a surplus lead before it even showed up on Property Appraiser's site. Already working the claim.
Clean CSV, full owner info, and every document already downloaded. This saves me hours every week.
This data feed is laser-targeted. Way better than clicking through county sites all day.
Already pulled two successful claims from the Sarasota dataset. Easily worth the subscription.
I used to scrape this manually, and it took forever. Now it just shows up every Friday. Game changer.
